Today, Dan and Jordan deal with Alex's absence from the studio by going back and finally covering something they had forgotten they never covered: the time that Donald Trump came on Infowars.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/10/27/episode-741-december-2-2015 Episode #741: December 2, 2015]</ref>:

*Trump's [https://www.factcheck.org/2016/08/trumps-revised-911-claim/ claims about NJ Muslims] celebrating 9/11 [https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/fact-checker/wp/2015/11/22/donald-trumps-outrageous-claim-that-thousands-of-new-jersey-muslims-celebrated-the-911-attacks/ were not vindicated]
*Trump's claims about predicting Osama Bin Laden [https://www.factcheck.org/2015/12/trumps-bin-laden-prediction/ are nonsense]
*[https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/05/magazine/alex-jones-infowars.html Josh Owens' article] about accompanying Joe Biggs on his trip to make anti-Muslim propaganda
